text: Strmec Podravski is a village in the municipality of Petrijanec, of the Varaždin County, Croatia. The village had 663 inhabitants in the 2011 census. The village is home to a relatively large number of Croatian Romani people.Romi u Strmcu Podravskom žele normalan život There has been an effort to help employ a greater number of the Romani population. Strmec has a memorial cross to the victims of World War II and the post-war period of the communist Yugoslav era.Blagoslov spomen-križa u šumi Gaj == References == == External links == * Strmec Podravski Category:Populated places in Varaždin County Category:Romani communities in Croatia
title: Strmec Podravski
